name: attio-enhanced
description: Enhanced Attio CRM API skill with batch operations
author: captmarbles

required_env_vars.name: ATTIO_API_KEY
required_env_vars.description: Your Attio API key from https://app.attio.com/settings/api

required_env_vars.name: ATTIO_WORKSPACE_ID
required_env_vars.description: Your Attio workspace ID (found in Attio URL: app.attio.com/[workspace-id]/...)

install.note: No file creation - set environment variables before use

runtime.note: Requires ATTIO_API_KEY and ATTIO_WORKSPACE_ID environment variables
